<div class = "col-md-6" >
Another great resource for detailed maps is [here](https://code.highcharts.com/mapdata/). Use the `GeoJSON` with `e_map_register` as shown below.

```{r}
library(echarts4r)

afghanistan <- jsonlite::read_json("https://code.highcharts.com/mapdata/countries/af/af-all.geo.json")
e_charts() %>% 
  e_map_register("AF", afghanistan) %>% 
  e_map(map = "AF")
```
